nodes.text: A dog was the pet of the Sith Lord Darth Maul. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, following the destruction of the Darth Star, when Maul was sucked out into outer space from Emperor Palpatine's Imperial-class Star Destroyer, he asked the Emperor to feed his dog, though the Darth was ultimately somehow able to get back for Darth Vader's ceremony at Coruscant.
